attributes.action: allow for statutory paternity pay to be paid to fathers with continous employment throughout the partner's/wife's pregnancy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently statutory paternity pay is only paid if a father is employed by the same employer for the duration of the pregnancy. However it should be paid as long as a father has been in continous employment throughout the pregnancy irrespective of who employs them.
